name: Jarvis
tagline: Repository of a JARVIS system to control my house
body:
### Browse the code
You can browse all the code and discover entrails [here](http://github.com/Seraf/JARVIS/) .

### Read the Documentation
All the documentation is on ReadTheDocs.

### Join us on IRC
If you have suggestions or questions about Jarvis you can also try the #jarvis IRC channel on OFTC.

### Report a bug
In the unfortunate event that bugs are discovered, they should be reported to the appropriate bug tracker.

### Licensing
The project is distributed under the terms of the AGPLv3 License.

The GNU Affero General Public License is a free, copyleft license for software and other kinds of works, specifically designed to ensure cooperation with the community in the case of network server software.
More informations about the license on the official website.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
